# Boots of Striding and Springing
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** feet

**Price** 5,500 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

These boots increase the wearerâ€™s base land speed by 10 feet. In addition to this striding ability (considered an enhancement bonus), these boots allow the wearer to make great leaps. She can jump with a +5 competence bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Longstrider (Spell)|longstrider]]*, creator must have 5 ranks in the [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] skill

**Cost** 2,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 503
